person.persName: John Piercy ( Lyon County, Ky, farmer )

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Ethridge Piercy in Caldwell County, Kentucky, on January 11, 1837. Father of Dicintha Piercy, Leander H. Piercy, Carey D. Piercy, Elizabeth A. Piercy, Phoebe Ann Piercy, John W. Piercy, Julia A. Piercy, and Thomas T. Piercy. Farmer in Trigg County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Lyon County in 1860.
